commandline: pwsh.exe -NoExit -Command "&{ $vsInstallPath=& "${env:ProgramFiles(x86)}/'Microsoft Visual Studio'/Installer/vswhere.exe" -products 'Microsoft.VisualStudio.Product.BuildTools'-property installationPath; Import-Module "$vsInstallPath/Common7/Tools/Microsoft.VisualStudio.DevShell.dll"; Enter-VsDevShell -VsInstallPath $vsInstallPath -SkipAutomaticLocation }"
name: Developer shell
